title: (x) Shu Uemura - Franklin Gothic, PL Brazilia {Jan E, Patricia, Lex, Yves}
content:
1. logo  
 [http://www.shuuemura-usa.com/images/logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140426101929/http:/www.shuuemura-usa.com/images/logo.gif "http://www.shuuemura-usa.com/images/logo.gif")  
2. SHU UEMURA SKIN PURIFIER  
 [http://www.shuuemura-usa.com/images/common/skincare\_face\_main.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140426101929/http:/www.shuuemura-usa.com/images/common/skincare_face_main.jpg "http://www.shuuemura-usa.com/images/common/skincare\_face\_main.jpg")  
3. headline font in website  
 [https://www.shuuemura-usa.com/images/common/label\_membersignin.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140426101929/https:/www.shuuemura-usa.com/images/common/label_membersignin.gif "https://www.shuuemura-usa.com/images/common/label\_membersignin.gif")
author: marcadonbalon

comments.content: Headline font (member sign-in) is Franklin Gothic.

Headline font looks like Franklin Gothic

I can't see the skin purifier font well enough to ID, do you have a better sample?

SKIN PURIFIER looks like Franklin Gothic as well.

- Lex

The Chalet looks like it was modified slightly - especially the 'r' which appears to be a truncated NineteenEighty while the rest looks like Nineteen Sixty

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20140426101929/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts")

\> Headline font looks like Franklin Gothic

\> I can’t see the skin purifier font well enough to ID, do you have a better sample?

Sorry all i could find on the net is this. But I do think that one is very much similar font as the headline font.

The Shu Uemura logo is the magnificent vintage wide grotesque [PL Brazilia Three](http://web.archive.org/web/20140426101929/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=brazilia&x=14&y=6&sample_text=shu%20uemura&sample_size=36). Once you've seen it you won't want to use Helvetica Extended or Akzidenz-Grotek Extended ever again. ;^)
Everything else is Franklin Gothic indeed. :^)
thank you very much! u guys are really great :)
